page.title: 07DOMESDAY SURVEY CONTINUED.
page.content: b)Going shopping 82% c)Going to the doctors. 24% d)To find Leisure activities. 79% Q6)Are you satisfied with the selection of shops in the village? YES27% NO 73% If NO state other shops required. 66% CHEMIST.15% FISH AND CHIP. 9% BANK. Q6 b)Are you satisfied with the facilities for leisure? YES 30% NO 66% Q6 c)Satisfied with medical provision. YES48% NO 42% ______________________________________ Q7 Asked about satisfaction with Police,Fire,Ambulance and Educational proviusion.All anwers were approx split 50% YES and 40% NO. Of the people surveyed only 6 worked in the village.
